parameters.DOSE: a numeric vector giving the herbicide concentration in muMol.
parameters.SLOPE: a numeric vector with the measured response: oxygen consumption of thylakoid membranes.
parameters.CURVE: a numeric vector specifying the assay or curve (a total of 5 independent assays where used in this experiment).
parameters.HERBICIDE: a character vector specifying the herbicide applied: bentazon or diuron.

title: Inhibition of photosynthesis
description:
Description
Data from an experiment investigating the inhibition of photosynthesis in response to two synthetic 
photosystem II inhibitors, the herbicides diuron and bentazon.
More specifically, the effect of oxygen consumption of thylakoid membranes (chloroplasts) from spinach
was measured after incubation with the synthetic inhibitors in 5 assays, resulting in 5 dose-response curves.
reference: The experiment is described in more details by Streibig (1998).
format: A data frame with 105 observations on the following four variables:
